title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 22.2 - Supplementary reports of low birth weights for epidemiological surveillance; filing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 22.2 - Supplementary reports of low birth weights for epidemiological surveillance; filing

State Regulations

Every physician, hospital, and person in attendance at live births shall file a supplementary report with the State Commissioner of Health of each live birth for which the birth weight is 2,500 grams (5.2 pounds) less. Such report shall be filed within 10 days of the birth and shall be on such forms as may be prescribed by the commissioner to facilitate epidemiological investigation and surveillance. Notes
